evidence.text: must recognize plaintiff’s title and position as Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel

extracted.value: Recognize plaintiff’s title and position as Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel

evidence.text: must not obstruct or interfere with his performance of his duties

extracted.value: Not obstruct or interfere with plaintiff’s performance of his duties

evidence.text: must not deny him the authority, benefits, or resources of his office

extracted.value: Not deny plaintiff the authority, benefits, or resources of his office

evidence.text: must not recognize any Acting Special Counsel in his place

extracted.value: Not recognize any Acting Special Counsel in plaintiff’s place

evidence.text: must not treat him in any way as if he has been removed, or recognize any other person as Special Counsel or as the head of the Office of Special Counsel, unless and until he is removed from office in accordance with 5 U.S.C. §1211(b)

extracted.value: Not treat plaintiff as removed or recognize any other person as Special Counsel or head of OSC, unless and until removed per 5 U.S.C. §1211(b)

evidence.text: the Court recognizes that the administrative stay restored plaintiff to the office from which the President had removed him

extracted.value: Restore plaintiff to the office from which the President had removed him

evidence.text: enjoined any efforts to impede his 'access to the resources or materials of that office'

extracted.value: Enjoin any efforts to impede plaintiff’s access to the resources or materials of that office

evidence.text: barred the installation of 'any other person as Special Counsel'

extracted.value: Bar the installation of any other person as Special Counsel
